title: House Marinade
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - ⅓ cup Squid Brand fish sauce
directions: 1. Combine the garlic and cilantro stems in a blender, add ½ cup of the coconut milk, and blend until the garlic and cilantro are a paste. Add the remaining coconut milk, fish sauce, sugar, salt, and pepper and blend until smooth.
2. Transfer the marinade to a container with a tight-fitting lid. Use immediately or store in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
